intent_atoms.description: Execute the random slice benchmark suite on macOS hardware once Combine support is available to compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads.
Benchmark results must show latency and throughput metrics for both mapped and chunked readers on macOS with Combine support.
Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support to validate the end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow.
Test execution must complete successfully without skipping scenarios, confirming UI automation works on macOS.
Execute the Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with the CLI harness.
Benchmark must run on macOS with Xcode/Combine and produce comparable latency data to the CLI version.
CoreData session bookmark diffs must be reconciled with live bookmark entities once reconciliation rules are defined.
Track outcome of the notarized build Apple Events automation assessment and reference final decision in documentation.
Decision on whether automation via Apple Events is required for notarized builds must be documented and entitlements extended safely.
Provide UIDocumentPicker integration for iOS/iPadOS once UIKit adapters are introduced.

functional_units.name: Random Slice Benchmark Execution
functional_units.description: Execute the random slice benchmark suite on macOS hardware to compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads.

functional_units.name: ParseTree Streaming Selection Automation Tests
functional_units.description: Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS with XCTest UI support to validate end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow.

functional_units.name: Combine-backed UI Benchmark Execution
functional_units.description: Execute the Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with the CLI harness.

functional_units.name: CoreData Session Bookmark Reconciliation
functional_units.description: Reconcile CoreData session bookmark diffs with live bookmark entities when reconciliation rules are defined.

functional_units.name: Notarized Build Apple Events Automation Assessment
functional_units.description: Track outcome of notarized build Apple Events automation assessment and document decision on required automation via Apple Events.

functional_units.name: UIDocumentPicker Integration for iOS/iPadOS
functional_units.description: Provide UIDocumentPicker integration for iOS/iPadOS once UIKit adapters are introduced, routing FilesystemAccess.live to the UIKit adapter.
